features: COMFORTABLE & BREATHABLE : This is a 100% cotton fabric face masks, very soft and comfortable to the skin. Made from special Bio-Wash Cotton Fabric for maximum softness, making them easy to breathe through. The fabric is sweat absorbent and thus can be worn during various day to day activities.

WASHABLE & REUSABLE : This being a washable face mask can be washed by hand and be left to air dry. It can also be washed in a normal/light load of machine in warm water and then tumble dried on medium heat. Even any shrinkage is observed post wash, theres nothing to worry. The masks are made of stretchable fabric which will help with a proper fit. This reusable face mask should be washed at least once a day.

UNIVERSAL SIZE & UNISEX SNUG FIT : iMasked cotton face cover is made from a stretchable, light weight, cotton fabric which makes it a comfortable fit. These masks will cover your nose and mouth efficiently, protecting you as well as others around you. Health Experts recommend that both the Nose and Mouth remain covered with a cloth during our daily indoors and outdoors activities.

SIMPLE SOLID COLOR & FASHIONABLE: The solid color soft cotton fabric black face mask and designer face mask gives a UNISEX wear option. These masks are non-medical graded having dimensions of 36 cm and 15 cm.Each Mask is for single person use only.

MADE IN INDIA : This breathable face mask have been manufactured and shipped with a lot of love from India with a Global Welfare Vision of "Made in India, Made for the World". iMasked cotton face mask are sold solely by Shankhnaad Global. description: To Mask the Faces! - iMASKED Face Masks
iMASKED mask brings to you a 100% pure cotton face mask. These cotton face mask are washable with the longevity owing to its 180gsm cotton fabric material.

This cloth face mask it is completely washable. The advantage of having a cloth face mask is that it can be washed by hand and can be left to dry simply by hanging them. They can be cleaned in a washing machine either in a normal or a light load and then rinsed in warm water. It is a reusable face mask it can be washed a number of times with detergent or mild soap that makes it as fresh as new.

iMASKED face masks fit comfortably across one's face and is available in free size. They are not only breathable and comfortable but also made from a special variety of bio-wash cotton fabric that ensures maximum softness and comfort for your skin. They are sweat absorbent and hence can be worn throughout the day and even during various activities.
iMASKED fashionable face masks are available in solid colors , helping you maintain your style statement. There are cute face masks for children, as well as simple and solid color face masks for men.

These stretchable face masks makes a snug fit perfectly across your mouth and nose. The adjustable face masks are designed for our customers mainly from North America and Europe. These black face masks for corporate uses with Unisex wear option.
These face masks are made completely in India. Manufactured with love, we bring to you the best quality if masks in the market.
